title: [Gameplay] Gangplank classic skin backing animation
body: When backing, Classic gangplank has no box to sit on, he sits on thin air, where a box should be. The box appears as you get back to base, and he disembarks it, but for the initial animation it is absent.

replies.body:
Hey Lampsundae,

Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating the issue. :]
